title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
might be able to help remove the parasite.

We told Nettie about the parasite. She seemed concerned and asked us to follow her to another room for treatment.

Find an antidote for the poison

Unable to heal us, Nettie spared us the horror of ceremorphosis - by poisoning one of us with deadly venom. We need to cure the poison immediately. Nettie's corpse told us of a cure - the Elixir of Silvanus. It seems related to flora of the Dalelands. To make the lifesaving antidote, we need to mix a bundle
